name: Bulldozer #GM20
description:
Bulldozer #GM20 is a small puzzle game made with only 20 lines of code! (Not counting all the stuff GM:S2 does behind the scenes).

Take a seat in a bulldozer and destroy all the damage buildings, so our city good be safe again!

Arrow keys - move around, select level on a title screen

Space, R - restart level

Escape - return to title screen

Code: Sebastian Wiśniowski

Art: Mirosław Wiśniowski

T-Rex Interactive 2019
